src.Utils

Class MultiScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Utils.MultiScreen

  • public class MultiScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for controlling multiple scenes. saves multiple panes as a HashMap and activates the pane whenever you want.
